column3: Welcome to Namai. Is there anything you wish to know about our village?
Ah, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, lovely to see you again. Is there anything you wish to know about our village?
What kind of place is this?
My name is Nanohana. I have lived here my entire life.
It may not be the liveliest of places, but our supply of clean water allows us to produce some of the realm's finest rice.
Namai's entire economy is based on the growing and selling of rice.
“Namai” is actually a local term for an arrowhead, a weed that can often be found growing in paddy fields.
It has been hard seeing so many of my friends taken away by the Empire, but I cling to the hope that they are still doing well.
It was tough to accept that the Empire had taken away so many of my friends, but it is high time I stopped moping and took action. Namai shall unite to help take back Doma!
We could not have reclaimed our homeland without your help, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. We shall be in your debt as long as we live.
